# Section 1

Here's a **code chunk** that samples from 
a _normal distribution_:

```{r}
samp = rnorm(100)
length(samp)
```

# Section 2

I can take the mean of the sample, too!
The mean is `r mean(samp);round(mean(samp),2)`.

#Section 3

This is going to make a plot! First I generate a dataframe, then use 'ggplot' to make a scaterplot.

```{r}
plot_df=
  tibble(
    x=rnorm(n=1000),
    y=1+2*x+rnorm(n=1000)
  )

ggplot(plot_df, aes(x=x,y=y))+geom_point()
```
